original: intros X P mm ll. split. - intros H. split. + induction ll. * apply Forall_nil. * apply Forall_cons. ++ apply Forall_inv in H. apply H. ++ apply IHll. apply Forall_inv_tail in H. apply H. + induction mm. * apply Forall_nil. * apply Forall_cons. ++ apply Forall_inv in H. apply H. ++ apply IHmm. apply Forall_inv_tail in H. apply H. - intros [H1 H2]. apply Forall_and. + induction ll. * apply Forall_nil. * apply Forall_cons. ++ apply Forall_inv. apply H1. ++ apply IHll. apply Forall_inv_tail in H1. apply H1. + induction mm. * apply Forall_nil. * apply Forall_cons. ++ apply Forall_inv. apply H2. ++ apply IHmm. apply Forall_inv_tail in H2. apply H2.
